title: Liam Hemsworth looks bruised and bloodied on set as ex-wife Miley Cyrus moves on with Cody Simpson
text:
He has thrown himself back into work after separating from wife Miley Cyrus.

And on Monday, Liam Hemsworth was pictured on set of his new action film, Dodge and Miles, in Canada.

The 29-year-old sported makeup to appear bruised and bloodied as he dashed around in character as protagonist Dodge Maynard.

Guess who's back! Liam Hemsworth looked bruised and bloodied on set of action film Dodge and Miles in Canada on Monday

For his day on set, Liam wore a longsleeve grey top and navy trousers.

He looked animated as he spoke to crew members, perhaps while getting into character.

During a previous shoot for the same movie, he filmed a scene in which he was run over by a taxi.

Back to work! Liam looked animated as he spoke to crew members

Action man: For his day on set, Liam wore a longsleeve grey top and navy trousers

New role: Liam plays the character of Dodge Maynard, who is trying to protect his pregnant wife while also being 'hunted' himself

Liam plays the character of Dodge Maynard, who is trying to protect his pregnant wife while also being 'hunted' himself.

Meanwhile, the actor's personal life is making headlines amid his split from Miley Cyrus, 26, after less than a year of marriage.

The former couple married in December 2018 at their home in Nashville, after dating on and off for almost a decade.

It's over! Meanwhile, Liam's personal life is making headlines amid his split from Miley Cyrus after less than a year of marriage. Pictured on their wedding day

Done and dusted! The former couple married in December 2018 at their home in Nashville (pictured), after dating on and off for almost a decade

They announced their break-up in August, with Liam later filing for divorce in LA.

Following the split, the Wrecking Ball star enjoyed a brief fling with Brody Jenner's ex Kaitlynn Carter.

She is now dating Australian singer-songwriter Cody Simpson.
description: He has thrown himself back into work after separating from wife Miley Cyrus.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
